definition: (in classical literature) young military officer of high rank for his age/(during the Cultural Revolution) young militant in the Red Guard/(in modern usage) rising star (in sport, politics etc)
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])

sentences.english: Liverpool are reportedly monitoring Valentin Stocker - with a view to making a January bid for the Swiss youngster.
sentences.chinese: 最近利物浦和瑞士小将斯托克尔联系在了一起。

sentences.english: The ambitions of the young and talented also reveal a lot.
sentences.chinese: 小手册透露出这些小将雄心的还真有不少。

sentences.english: If you have seen Little Big Soldier , you will understand why canola flowers are so important in the movie.
sentences.chinese: 如果你们看过《大兵小将》就会明白油菜花的意义。

sentences.english: Czech teen Vaidisova is looking for her first Grand Slam title.
sentences.chinese: 捷克小将瓦娃在期待她的第一个大满贯。

sentences.english: "Hoisting ring's king" rookie player Chen Yibing has demonstrated brilliant performance which made me clap the table.
sentences.chinese: “吊环王”小将陈一冰的精彩表现令我拍案叫绝。

sentences.english: The Spanish starlet curled home a superb free-kick after 10 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 比赛开始10分钟，西班牙小将任意球弧线钻进网窝。

sentences.english: Zhou Yang of China coasted to victory in the women's 1500m short-track speed skating at the Winter Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 中国小将周洋在女子1500米短道速滑中轻松夺冠。

sentences.english: He’s a great guy, a basketball player, you know. And a Boy Scout.
sentences.chinese: 他是个好孩子，篮球小将，也是一名童子军。

sentences.english: Brazilian Vitor Flora and Hungarian Andras Simon were also on the mark for the Reds.
sentences.chinese: 巴西人弗洛拉和匈牙利小将西蒙在比赛中有所斩获。

sentences.english: Si handkerchief Lettie uses in the young fellow plum to change Totty .
sentences.chinese: 斯帕莱蒂则用小将梅内换下托蒂。

sentences.english: Earlier this year, China picked Ding Hui, a young man from Hangzhou, for its national volleyball team.
sentences.chinese: 今年早些时候，杭州小将丁慧入选国家男子排球队。

sentences.english: "Captain Tsubasa" Japan eyes of the public well-deserved hero.
sentences.chinese: 《足球小将》是日本民众心目中当之无愧的英雄。

definition: lit. old general/commander-in-chief 將帥|将帅, the equivalent of king in Chinese chess/fig. old-timer/veteran
to replace (a damaged component with a new one, an injured player with a substitute player, full-time workers with casual workers etc)/a substitute/a replacement
middle period of a tripartite provincial exam (in former times)/midfield/mid-court (in sports)/half-time/intermission half-way through a performance
(sports) member of the national team/national representative/(medicine, chess etc) one of the most highly skilled practitioners in one's country
on stage/to go on stage/to take the field
to defeat decisively/to win decisively/great victory/triumph
